p: Compared with open surgical technique, laparoscopic technique takes the advantage of the hospitalization, blood loss, postoperative complications, and recovery time. 12 However, urinary incontinence after LRP may significantly impact patients' quality-of-life. They may have feelings of low self-esteem, anxiety, and depression. 13 UI after LRP is mainly from urethral sphincter deficiency or detrusor overactivity. 14 Therefore, the preservation of many anatomic structures of the prostate and the way of urethral reconstruction are important factors for the recovery of urine control and even sexual function. 15
